AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hector Galvencio Paz-Ortega and Carlos E: Two Guatemalan citizens transported illegally by Juventino Mejia-Orosco
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hector Galvencio Paz-Ortega: Passenger, citizen of Guatemala, and relative of Juventino Mejia-Orosco
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Carlos Enrique Cruz-Morales: Passenger, citizen of Guatemala, and relative of Juventino Mejia-Orosco
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Juventino Mejia-Orosco, Hector Galvencio: Group involved in human smuggling operation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Juventino Mejia-Orosco's van: vehicle used for transporting smuggled aliens from Guatemala, seized pending forfeiture proceedings
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Court of Appeals: Federal court reviewing sentences for legality and reasonableness, with authority to remand cases for further sentencing proceedings
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Commission Guid: Guidelines for federal sentencing, applied by courts to determine sentence ranges
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: Federal court imposing sentences, subject to review by the United States Court of Appeals
